title: "Spielo" logo
content:
![your_file_name.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20120717153225im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/1202.jpg)  
My client believes that his wordmark contains custom lettering. Does anyone recognize?
author: anonymous

comments.content: I have seen it without the special effects but do not recall where. I would guess it is shareware.

Dunno, but the optical illusion of warping (most notable in the corner of the "p") is fascinating.   
   
hhp
